recap_documents.description: NOTICE OF FILING OF OFFICIAL TRANSCRIPT of Competency Hearing filed as to Steven Joseph Christopher for dates of 7-27-09 and 7-28-09 before Judge Henry T. Wingate, re 24 Notice of Appeal - Final Judgment Court Reporter Gina Morris, Telephone Number 601-965-4350. NOTICE RE : REDACTION OF TRANSCRIPTS: The parties have seven (7) calendar days to file with the Court a Notice of Intent to Request Redaction of this transcript. If no Notice is filed, the transcript will be made electronically available to the public without redaction after 90 calendar days. The policy is located on the court website at www.mssd.uscourts.gov. Transcript may be viewed at the court public terminal or purchased through the Court Reporter before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date it may be obtained through the Court Reporter or PACER. Redaction Request due 2/12/2010. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 2/22/2010. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 4/22/2010. (GM) (Entered: 01/22/2010)
